item.title: Coordinates Safezone? Help :)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“mike0631, post:14, topic:428233”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=530924.msg3877915#msg3877915 date=1325797560]

    public boolean safeZone() {
	return (absX > 3090 && absX < 3099 && absY > 3487 && absY < 3500);
    }

    public boolean inWild() {
	return (absX > 1 && absX < 10000 && absY > 1 && absY < 10000 || absX > 1 && absX < 10000 && absY > 1 && absY < 10366);
    }

Now, find every inWild and add a or statement,

[tt] || !inSafeZone()[/tt]
[/quote]

Can you give an example to where to add it?[/quote]

the main ones?

client class
playerassistant class
player class
walking class
attackPlayer class(maybe?)

Read full topic

@mike0631 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:13, topic:428233”][code=java]
public boolean safeZone() {
return (absX > 3090 && absX < 3099 && absY > 3487 && absY < 3500);
}

public boolean inWild() {
return (absX > 1 && absX < 10000 && absY > 1 && absY < 10000 || absX > 1 && absX < 10000 && absY > 1 && absY < 10366);
}

[/code]

Now, find every inWild and add a or statement,

[tt] || !inSafeZone()[/tt][/quote]

Can you give an example to where to add it?

Read full topic

item.title: Coordinates Safezone? Help :)
item.dc:creator: @mike0631 mike0631
item.description:
@mike0631 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:11, topic:428233”]Ah, okay. Well you would need the bank coords for all four corners & you will need to make the bank not wild. (Not just with the boolean; where the ‘inWild’ boolean actually declares the wild to be WILD.

What’s the code you have so far.[/quote]

This are my coords now:

public boolean safeZone() {
		if(absX > 3090 && absX < 3099 && absY > 3487 && absY < 3500	//Edgeville bank
		|| absX > 2818 && absX < 2866 && absY > 3420 && absY < 3444) {	//Ignore this one
			return true;
		}
	return false;
}

public boolean inWild() {
	if(absX > 1 && absX < 10000 && absY > 1 && absY < 10000 
	|| absX > 1 && absX < 10000 && absY > 1 && absY < 10366) { 
		return true;
		}
	return false;
}

Read full topic

[/quote]

I am trying to make the full world PvP.
So i did that.

EVERYTHING is now wildy except for edgeville bank.
But the skull (That means it is wildy) is still there.
And wildy level -2.
And you cant bank and teleport. But you cant also attack people INSIDE the bank, Outside you cant.

How do i fix this?[/quote]If you wish to make the whole world pvp just like make a big square…no clip to the four corners and get the coords…

item.title: Coordinates Safezone? Help :)
item.dc:creator: @mike0631 mike0631
item.description:
@mike0631 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:6, topic:428233”][quote author=MajorPro link=topic=530924.msg3877858#msg3877858 date=1325795873]

public boolean safeZone() { if(absX > 2818 && absX < 2866 && absY > 3420 && absY < 3444) { return true; } return false; }
The south/west end goes into x1,y1; and the north/east end goes into x2,y2.
[/quote]

What the hell? Why???

You could simplify that by a ton

public boolean safeZone() { return (absX > 2818 && absX < 2866 && absY > 3420 && absY < 3444); } [/quote]

Uhm can you help me with:

it does still say Wildy level -2, And cant bank.
How do i fix that?

Read full topic
